title: Spaced Learning-Based Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program: Complexity Management Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts (operations, functions, graphs, etc.)
context.additional_context: Structured around applied math cases relevant to managerial tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can explain complex mathematical concepts with over 80% accuracy using a three-phase spaced learning cycle (learning-rest-review).
Learners can recall 70% of work-related mathematical formulas after 48 hours by applying mental rehearsal techniques.
Learners can select spaced learning strategies based on data complexity (simple: 3-day intervals/complex: 5-day intervals) to complete project tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
